long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension that modifies the schedule page of Wolfnet to show more detailed information about current progress. This does not track any user activity and simply injects CSS and HTML (and JavaScript)

Version 2.0.3.1:
    - Removed extraneous permissions
  
Features:
    - Grade display on schedule page
    - Average of grades
    - Hidable and individually showable grades
    - Attendance Records on schedule page
    - Assignments on schedule page
    - Different colour palettes
    - Annoying double sign-in skipping
